transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello
Executive: Ji very good morning sir.
Customer: Ji sir main se baat kar rahi h India Mart head office se aapke account manager.
Executive: Ha boliye mam.
Customer: Ji sir aapka jo catalog enlistment ka ek ticket open tha sir aapka jo catalog score hai sir wo 58% hai sir to usko update karwana tha abhi sir total jo hai 123 product hai India Mart me aapka theek hai.
Customer: Ha ha.
Executive: Usme sir ye kafi sari jo details hai wo incomplete hai to sir aap mujhe bataye abhi matlab aapke pass detail hai available.
Customer: Abhi details nahi mam actually abhi hamara shifting chalu hai.
Executive: Achcha shifting chalu hai.
Customer: Ha hamara warehouse hai na shift kar rahe hain hum dusri jagah.
Executive: Achcha achcha to sir kab tak free ho jayenge sir aap.
Customer: Mam ek do din me ho jayega proper Monday ko Monday tak.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Kyunki wo dusri service me kar rahe hain hum.
Executive: Ji ji.
Customer: To sir Monday ko nikal ke rakh dunga aap aap update kar dijiyega details.
Executive: Bilkul bilkul to sir aap mujhe bataye monday ko 11 baje lagaunga aapko call.
Customer: Okay okay theek hai details kaise hai ek bar bata dijiye mujhe main ready rakhunga.
Executive: Sir jab aap seller panel open karenge na apna to jo product hai us pe aap click karenge to waha pe aap right side dekhte ho aapko jo score hai wo 100 me se aapko dikhta hoga 40 50 30 hai na to waha pe aapko jo hai product ki detail aur photo pdf jo bhi hai wo update karke kam se kam jo har product ka score hai na sir wo 80 karna hai.
Customer: Okay okay theek hai mam matlab kitni photo upload kar sakte hain mam.
Executive: Ha bilkul sare product aapke total 123 product hai aapke sir to usme sab pe jo score hai wo minimum sir 85 matlab 80 hona chahiye.
Customer: Okay okay theek hai mam.
Executive: Aur 10 product aapke d rank me bhi hai ab d rank wale jo product hai sir isme aap matlab aapke catalog me add nahi hai ye product but aap use kar rahe ho by lead iski to aap mujhe bataye agar aap isko deal karte ho to main aapke catalog me add kar deti hu theek hai taki aapke pass is product ki bhi direct calls inquiries ab acche se aaye jaise aapka sport accessories isme deal karte hain sir.
Customer: Ha ha.
Executive: Sport uniform pura item a uske andar ha sport uniform bhi hai.
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Okay aur aapka sport equipment ha sport equipment.
Executive: Okay sport wear ha usme hi hai mam.
Executive: Adidas track suit ha matlab jaise kisi ko customize me chahiye Adidas ka type me jaise material rehta hai us type ka material bana ke de do isme matlab customize karke dete hain brand aapka rehta hai right.
Customer: Nahi Adidas ka hi rehta hai brand matlab brand Adidas bhi nahi bana track suit bas usme nahi ke logo lagate hain Adidas ka.
Executive: Okay us type me matlab customer ko customize karke aap de sakte hain brand Adidas pe hi rahega.
Customer: Ha matlab jaise suppose usko logo chahiye baju me Adidas ka chahiye uske side me left hand side pe uska logo chahiye koi jaise school ho gaye uniform ho gaye to wo lagata hai sir uske upar.
Executive: Okay cricket tennis ball ha tennis ball.
Executive: Kabaddi jersey ha mam.
Executive: Okay mens sport wear ha mam usme hai.
Executive: Kids track suit ha pvc cricket ball hmm to in sab me deal karte hain aap right.
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: To sir inke aapke jo 10 product main sir aisa karti hu aapke catalog me ye jo 10 keyword hai na sir theek hai main aapke catalog me ye product ka naam add kar deti hu abhi theek hai baki jo sir iske product ke photo images aur jo description honge theek hai to wo sir aap jo hai matlab aapke pass hoga na sir ye sab cheeze.
Customer: Ha ha ho mam.
Executive: To aap sir ek bar hai na mujhe matlab monday ko aap bol rahe ho ki abhi to main busy hu but monday ko sir isko complete karte hain theek hai to main ye 10 keyword aur add kar deti hu aap please monday aapka sir ek group bhi banaya hai humne whatsapp pe isme add ho aap ji ji ha ha usme add hai ha to sir waha pe bhi aap mujhe product ki photo wagera provide kar sakte ho ya fir monday ko sir aap free rehna aur hum meeting karke ye sari cheeze update kar denge.
Customer: Okay okay theek hai mam sunday ko off rehta hai madam aapka.
Executive: Sunday ko sir off rehta hai lekin agar aap time de sakte ho to hum us pe kam kar lenge koi dikkat nahi hai.
Customer: Okay okay theek hai mam aapko update kar dunga.
Executive: Theek hai sir theek hai okay ji ji thank you sir ji.
summary:
Concerns:

- Catalog score is 58%, needs to be updated.

- Many product details are incomplete.

- 10 products are in D rank.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to add 10 keywords to catalog.

- Executive offered to add D rank products to catalog.

- Executive informed about updating product details.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will provide product details on Monday.

- Executive will call on Monday at 11 AM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- catalog, product details, score, d rank, update
